author: Cleo Abram
description:
If you dug a hole toward the center of the Earth… how deep would you still find life?

Recent research shows there are way more living things than we ever thought!

It’s called the “DEEP BIOSPHERE” and we now know it’s more than twice the size of all of Earth’s oceans, combined!

The deepest we’ve found life so far is around... 

For optimistic science and tech stories, subscribe!

#shorts #biosphere #digging #science #life #deep #animation
title: How Deep Does Life Exist?
